<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Pulverizing Cascade](/Spells.aspx?ID=1311)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Rage of Elements](/Sources.aspx?ID=205) pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 201 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 10-foot radius, 20-foot-tall  cylinder

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You raise a pair of towering waves and slam them into each other, crushing creatures caught between them. Creatures in the area take 5d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the damage by 2d6.
name: Pulverizing Cascade
